question:
Your friend invited you to his/her party, but you are unable to attend.
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter


•explain why you cannot come
•give your reason for not contacting your friend sooner
•suggest another time to meet


Write at least 150 words. You do NOT need to write any addresses. Begin your letter as follows: Dear ____________,
text: Hope this letter finds you well. I'm writing in connection to your invitation about your daughter's birthday party falls on the 24th January 2022.

I'm so happy to share that I have recently signed a new project related to Artificial intelligence. As you know that my ambition is to create machine development in order to recognise the personality of human traits with great accuracy. Now, I got an opportunity to explore my knowledge in the new assignment.

I'm sorry for not reaching out to you as I have been up to my eyeballs in reports and presentations. Moreover, I would like to say sorry as I will not be able to attend the party because that's the beginning day of my new project.
I hope you will understand my situation. I will meet you next month as I will complete this project by the end of this month. See you soon.
